content.raw: @Malcolm Stagg yesterday I tried Urban Worlds available on CloudSim \(I picked world 3 and 8 because our X2 does not like railway very much\) and scored some points. I tried old submitted version as well as new “identical” with tweaks needed for System Track \(we use the same code base\), that we did not break Virtual for the last crazy month. It worked so I wanted to propose you to test it there too, but I see “SODIUM – 24 Robotics” on all leaderboards so you already tried that …
content.html: @Malcolm Stagg yesterday I tried Urban Worlds available on CloudSim (I picked world 3 and 8 because our X2 does not like railway very much) and scored some points. I tried old submitted version as well as new “identical” with tweaks needed for System Track (we use the same code base), that we did not break Virtual for the last crazy month. It worked so I wanted to propose you to test it there too, but I see “SODIUM – 24 Robotics” on all leaderboards so you already tried that …
